mapper.select: SELECT STDR_DT /* 기준일자 */ , JOB_OPNG_DTIME /* 업무개시일시 */ , JOB_CLSG_DTIME /* 업무마감일시 */ , CLSG_DVSN_CD /* 마감구분코드 */ , OPNG_STFNO /* 개시직원번호 */ , OPNG_ORGNO /* 개시조직번호 */ , HDWR_OPNG_YN /* 수기개시여부 */ , CLSG_STFNO /* 마감직원번호 */ , CLSG_ORGNO /* 마감조직번호 */ , HDWR_CLSG_YN /* 수기마감여부 */ , HND_DETL_DTM /* 조작상세일시 */ , HND_EMPNO /* 조작사원번호 */ , HND_TMNL_NO /* 조작단말기번호 */ , HND_TR_ID /* 조작거래ID */ , GUID /* GUID */ FROM IBIMS998B WHERE STDR_DT = #{stdrDt}
mapper.update: MERGE INTO IBIMS998B AS T USING ( SELECT #{stdrDt} AS STDR_DT, #{jobOpngDtime} AS JOB_OPNG_DTIME, #{clsgDvsnCd} AS CLSG_DVSN_CD, #{opngStfno} AS OPNG_STFNO, #{opngOrgno} AS OPNG_ORGNO, #{hdwrOpngYn} AS HDWR_OPNG_YN, #{hndEmpno} AS HND_EMPNO, #{hndTmnlNo} AS HND_TMNL_NO, #{hndTrId} AS HND_TR_ID, #{guid} AS GUID FROM DUAL ) ST ON (T.STDR_DT = ST.STDR_DT) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET T.JOB_OPNG_DTIME = #{jobOpngDtime}, T.CLSG_DVSN_CD = #{clsgDvsnCd}, T.OPNG_STFNO = #{opngStfno}, T.OPNG_ORGNO = #{opngOrgno}, T.HDWR_OPNG_YN = #{hdwrOpngYn}, T.HND_EMPNO = #{hndEmpno}, T.HND_TMNL_NO = #{hndTmnlNo}, T.HND_TR_ID = #{hndTrId}, T.GUID = #{guid} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( STDR_DT , JOB_OPNG_DTIME , CLSG_DVSN_CD , OPNG_STFNO , OPNG_ORGNO , HDWR_OPNG_YN , HND_EMPNO , HND_TMNL_NO , HND_TR_ID , GUID ) VALUES ( #{stdrDt} , #{jobOpngDtime} , #{clsgDvsnCd} , #{opngStfno} , #{opngOrgno} , #{hdwrOpngYn} , #{hndEmpno} , #{hndTmnlNo} , #{hndTrId} , #{guid} );
